entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:22 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:22 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 7:22 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
